Title: Awakening
Description: Protagonist awakens from their cryopod with cryosickness, which disorients them. Unsure of when and where they are, they begin searching for answers.

Title: Disorientation
Description: The protagonist has just exited the cryopod, trying to figure out what happened.

Title: Cryo Bay
Description: Rows of pods, most sealed, a few cracked. Silence, except for the hum of failing systems.

Title: Exposed Wiring
Description: Narrow maintenance corridor, flickering blue lights. Ozone in the air. Loose burned cables dangle from the ceiling.

Title: The Corridor Door
Description: Metallic hallway, dim blue strips of light. A sealed door with a weak access panel flickers faintly.

Title: Corridor Encounter
Description: Dim metallic hallway. Irene and Darius approach, breath clouding in cold air.

Title: Maintenance Corridor
Description: Long, dimly lit hallway with flickering blue lights and mist along the floor.

Title: Airlock Door
Description: Thick blast door labeled AIRLOCK under a single flickering red light.
